name: vet-course-generator
description: AI-powered veterinary course generation pipeline — converts vet expertise into online video courses

scripts.start: echo 'Vet Course Generator v3.0 — Available commands:' && echo '  npm run batch:scripts -- --syllabus <path> [--budget 5] [--dry-run]' && echo '  npm run batch:quality -- --course <id> [--budget 3] [--dry-run]' && echo '  npm run batch:videos  -- --course <id> [--budget 50] [--dry-run]' && echo '  npm run status        -- --course <id> [--detailed]' && echo '  npm test' && echo '' && echo 'See README.md for full documentation.'
